Reviews.Title: This product is necessary for those of you who specialize in home Micro-cams, and Pinhole cams!
Reviews.Author: Sam's-Review
Reviews.Content: You need the  cctc-video-audio extension cords for your pinhole cams. The connectors that come with these cams are NOT long enough. They may have only 6” to 12” connectors on them. You need to have at least a 25’ or longer extension cord to reach from you monitors to the window or were ever you are trying to mount your cameras. Thanks.

ProductInfo.Features:
Clover model CA060Y video extension cable
Normally used for outdoor purposes
Includes one RCA Video connector and DC jack
60-feet long, black in color, does not support audio
For use with almost all of Clover's surveillance cameras
ProductInfo.Name: Clover Electronics CA060Y 60-Feet Power and Video RCA Cable - Small (Black)
